metadata.Title: CVE-2013-4347 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The (1) make_nonce, (2) generate_nonce, and (3) generate_verifier functions in SimpleGeo python-oauth2 uses weak random numbers to generate nonces, which makes it easier for remote attackers to guess the nonce via a brute force attack.

criterions.comment: python-oauth2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
